title: Biblelens
description:
This is a full walkthrough of a bible verse + photo sharing app I helped build.

This "Snapchat-esc" app was full of custom animations and interactions! Take a look at the custom left-right scrolling section ðŸ˜‰

This app managed to get over 2 million installs before it was taken out of the app store!

title: HuntWise Wind Interaction
description:
A subtle interaction to see wind and weather info for a user's hunting location.

The particle effect uses wind speed and direction variables from the current selected time.

(I am no longer apart of this project)

title: HuntWise Prediction UI
description:
An interface for hunters to see the best times to hunt, and why those times are the best.

This design was based on metrics, testing, and feedback that resulted in a good balance of visuals and usablility.

(I am no longer apart of this project)

title: HuntWise Details
description:
A couple designs from the prediction section of HuntWise.

Details and dimensions are super important to show. Without showcasing what a dev needs to pay attention to, the end result could be very different from the design.

(I am no longer apart of this project)

title: Material Message
description:
An idea I had to transform a simple button into a larger surface.

This is made with jQuery listening for css transition changes and conditions.

title: Cheddar
role: Product Design, Android Engineering & Backend Engineering
description:
This is a full bitcoin wallet that supprts onchain and offchain transactions. The bitcoin node and block explorer (which are completely custom) are hosted on a kubernetes cluster.

The app is written in Android native kotlin.

title: Sleep Sounds
description:
This is a walkthrough of a sound playing app for helping people fall asleep.

This app depended heavily on the MediaPlayer API and a custom caching layer so all sounds could play offline. It was also fully integrated to support interactive notifications and Google Play Subscriptions.

title: Word Nerd
description:
A game where you rhyme with as many words as possible without letting the timer end. (Like Flappy Bird for rhyming)

Users are scored based on the amount of syllables they use.

title: CoffeeCram Onboarding
description:
A subtle transition that links the user's touch position to a background opacity change.

Essentially, a UIView is changing it's alpha value based on the offset of the x-position in the UICollectionView. That same x-position also changes the position of the pagination dot.

Written in Swift.

title: Carbon Branding
description: This is the final logo for a crypto currency brand. I also designed and partially developed their website as well.

title: Simple Scale
description:
A fun weight tracking app without any extra clutter!

All the controls and views (including the graph!) are custom. User data is written and read with Firebase's realtime database and authentication.

The app supports 6 languages, and has a mostly international user base.

title: Tanto Calendar Interaction
description:
This is the gesture based interaction to reveal the calendar in a hair stylist scheduling app. Not only is the gesture a heavy modification on BottomSheet, but the Calendar was completely built from scratch as well.

This allows users to quickly swipe down and see the calendar without having to click everytime.

title: Restaurant Menu UI
description: An interface for a restaurant chain with blends ideas from real world menus and common app layouts.

title: Restraunt App Details
description:
A snippet from the Sketch doc used for designing the restaurant app shown above.

It's critical to understand how a user may navigate a product. Depicting navigation visually helps everyone understand the app's flow.
